name: Broken Orbit
description:
After a lengthy deep-space mission, two astronauts are ready for an easy ride back to Earth. However, after the simulated gravity well breaks down, the engineer while performing a spacewalk witnesses a calamity that makes seeing his seeing his family, or even surviving the trip back, a very unlikely conclusion. Complete mind-bending puzzles that you could twist your dimensions as well as antagonist crew that makes going home more than a simple means for survival, but a haven of loved ones.

This game was made in 48 hours by Team Orbit for Global Game Jam 2019! Submission page can be found here.
